titles.title: To provide additional security for nuclear facilities under certain circumstances.
To provide additional security for nuclear facilities under certain circumstances.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: Requires the Secretary of Transportation to prohibit any commercial or private aircraft from flying below 18,000 feet within a ten-mile radius of a commercial nuclear power reactor licensed by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission if the threat alert level determined by the Homeland Security Advisory System is elevated to code orange or code red.
